response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me and is priced at $1,200,000, reflecting its unique qualities and potential benefits. I believe this offer strikes a balance between fairness and profitability, considering the product's worth to both of us. Should you choose to accept this proposal, it would not only be a significant investment for you but also a strategic move that could yield substantial returns. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
